'''Siriondil''' was a [[Gondorians|Gondorian]] nobleman.

==History==
Siriondil was the son of [[Calimmacil]], and a nephew of King [[Narmacil II]] (d. {{TA|1856}}) and as such, a distant cousin of King [[Ondoher]] of Gondor. He was probably named after his ancestor [[Siriondil (King of Gondor)|Siriondil]], a former King of [[Gondor]]. In {{TA|1883}} he had a son, [[Eärnil II|Earnil]].<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, Eärnil II</ref>

After [[Ondoher]] and his sons were slain in a battle against the [[Wainriders]] in {{TA|1944}}, the [[Third Age 1945|next year]] Eärnil was elected the thirty-second King of Gondor.<ref>{{App|Gondor}}</ref>

==Etymology==
:''See: [[Siriondil (King of Gondor)#Etymology]]''
